summary: The diff implements REQ-6 (header branding update) and REQ-7 (page title/meta tags update) successfully. However, REQ-8 (hero banner text update) is not addressed in the provided diff, indicating a missing requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the hero banner text on the catalog page from 'Fresh Dairy Market' to 'DairyDelight' if present
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any modifications to the Catalog page component (frontend/src/pages/Catalog.tsx) where the hero banner text would be located. The frontend-file-summaries.txt confirms a hero banner exists on the Catalog page, but no changes to this file are included in the diff.
